questions.questionText: In Margaret Atwood’s dystopian novel The Year of the Flood, reckless and inhumane behaviour among the humans leads to a world on the brink of destruction.

answerOptions.responseText: Try again! Did you think about what the fish may symbolize?
That’s correct! Although unseen, the fish is the symbol of all of nature.
Try again! Did you think about what the fish may symbolize?
Not quite! Although unseen, the fish is the symbol of all of nature, so this is an example of Character vs Nature.
